79719018100675200.Text: Bring Synnolian Tunifus five units of muck for cure common disease potions. A farmer in Gnisis, Abishpulu Shand, has a muckspunge patch right near his hut, and Chaplain Ogrul at Fort Darius has cut a deal with Shand to gather muck there for free. While I'm in the West Gash, look in on Chaplain Ogrul, give him four Restore Health potions, and ask him if he'll teach me a few tricks.

1960297291109528990.Text: I told Synnolian Tunifus I would not be able to bring him the five units of muck he asked for. He was disappointed, and told me to take a day to reflect on my shortcomings, and attempt to amend them before I approach him again for a lay healer mission.

127285728656021157.Text: I gave Chaplain Ogrul the four Restore Health potions as Synnolian Tunifus requested.

966538071595322226.Text: Chaplain Ogrul taught me a restoration spell.

20162204831428711877.Text: Chaplain Ogrul offered to teach me a restoration spell, but I declined.

634711112268428418.Text: I delivered five units of muck to Synnolian Tunifus. He gave me a cure common disease potion, a retort, and a copy of 'The Alchemists Formulary' -- a collection of popular alchemical recipes -- as a reward.
